name: Dead Veil
description:
You have died and find yourself in a dungeon wearing a mysterious mask. You have gained the ability to see spirits and avoid your complete demise. Can you use your newfound power to survive the monsters and find all the fragments of your soul to revive yourself?

Controls:

WASD to move

Instructions:

1. Download the file

2. Extract the zipped file

3. Double-click the application

4. Enjoy!
